verses.verse: Set the trumpet<WH7782> to thy mouth<WH2441>. As an eagle<WH5404> he cometh against the house<WH1004> of Jehovah<WH3068>, because they have transgressed<WH5674> my covenant<WH1285>, and trespassed<WH6586> against my law<WH8451>.
They <WH3478> shall cry<WH2199> unto me<WH430>, My God, we Israel know thee<WH3045>.
Israel <WH3478> hath cast off<WH2186> that which is good<WH2896>: the enemy<WH341> shall pursue him<WH7291>.

They have set up kings<WH4427>, but not by me<WH7786>; they have made princes, and I knew<WH3045> it not<WH3701>: of their silver and their gold<WH2091> have they made<WH6213> them idols<WH6091>, that they may be cut off<WH3772>.
He hath cast<WH2186> off thy calf<WH5695>, O Samaria<WH8111>; mine anger<WH639> is kindled<WH2734> against them<WH3808>: how long will it be ere they attain<WH3201> to innocency<WH5356>?
For from Israel<WH3478> is even this<WH2796>; the workman made<WH6213> it<WH430>, and it is no God; yea<WH5695>, the calf of Samaria<WH8111> shall be broken in pieces<WH7616>.

For they sow<WH2232> the wind<WH7307>, and they shall reap<WH7114> the whirlwind<WH5492>: he hath no standing<WH7054> grain<WH6780>; the blade shall yield<WH6213> no meal<WH7058>; if<WH194> so be it yield<WH6213>, strangers<WH2114> shall swallow it up<WH1104>.
Israel <WH3478> is swallowed up<WH1104>: now are they among the nations<WH1471> as a vessel<WH3627> wherein none delighteth<WH2656>.
For they are gone up<WH5927> to Assyria<WH804>, like a wild ass<WH6501> alone<WH909> by himself<WH669>: Ephraim hath hired<WH8566> lovers<WH158>.

Yea <WH8566>, though they hire among the nations<WH1471>, now will I gather<WH6908> them<WH4592>; and they begin to be diminished<WH2490> by reason of the burden<WH4853> of the king<WH4428> of princes<WH8269>.
Because Ephraim<WH669> hath multiplied<WH7235> altars<WH4196> for sinning<WH2398>, altars<WH4196> have been unto him for sinning<WH2398>.
I wrote<WH3789> for him the ten thousand things<WH7230> of my law<WH8451>; but they are counted<WH2803> as a strange thing<WH2114>.

As for the sacrifices<WH2076> of mine offerings<WH1890>, they sacrifice<WH2077> flesh<WH1320> and eat<WH398> it<WH3068>; but Jehovah accepteth<WH7521> them not<WH2142>: now will he remember their iniquity<WH5771>, and visit<WH6485> their sins<WH2403>; they shall return<WH7725> to Egypt<WH4714>.

For Israel<WH3478> hath forgotten<WH7911> his Maker<WH6213>, and builded<WH1129> palaces<WH1964>; and Judah<WH3063> hath multiplied<WH7235> fortified<WH1219> cities<WH5892>: but I will send<WH7971> a fire<WH784> upon his cities<WH5892>, and it shall devour<WH398> the castles thereof<WH759>.
